abilities.name: Energy Flame
abilities.effect: All Energy attached to Charizard ex are Fire Energy instead of its usual type.

attacks.name: Burn Down
attacks.effect: Discard 5 Fire Energy attached to Charizard ex. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poké-Powers, Poké-Bodies, and any other effects on the Defending Pokémon.
